column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////If you could imagine a french pastry shop in Disneyland/Disneyworld
column2: this would be the place. You're waiting in line and the experience is short but you'll love pretty much everything you're doing and eating during the time you're there
column3: but the servers might be the ones who ruin the experience. Skip the macarons
column4: focus on the pastries (buttery goodness that sticks to your lips)
column5: and the pain perdu is apparently good
column6: but make sure you share otherwise you'll be hibernating for the rest of the day.
